channel.title: Ben's Mental Models RSS feed.
channel.description: An RSS Feed for the blog about Ben Hirsch's various writings on Computer Science, Math, and himself.

item.title: Clever Initial Blog Post Title
item.description:
So this is a blog about me. But what about me in particular? Well here’s a fact about me: I’m currently writing this entry to see what it’ll look like on my blog and to stretch out my blog a little bit.

You see, I consider myself a fantastic writer. I really do. I am able to BS with the best of em; I can churn out 5 pages in the blink of an eye. If words were my domain I would certainly not be surjective because the quantity of words I can combine and transform into a coherent sequence of thoughts is uncountably infinite.

Right now I just finished my Theory of Computation final, I’m considering what hosting to use for this blog (nothing over $10/month please, college kid here), and I’m waiting for a good time to make dinner. Carne asada and some left over turkey chili. It’s only 5 oclock right now so I’m not quite ready to eat yet.
